name: Engage Rocket
description: Engage Rocket empowers organizations with a leading global employee experience platform, fostering a culture of success. Trusted by companies in 18 countries across 20 industries, our technology facilitates continuous listening and real-time analytics. With us, organizations enhance employee engagement, leading to increased productivity and a workplace where individuals thrive and perform at their best, driving success for both people and businesses alike.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Engage your people. Build an elite workplace.
ShortDescription: Employee engagement platform that boosts satisfaction and retention from day one.

Highlights.name: Benchmark with Industry Data
Highlights.description: See how you stack up. EngageRocket lets you compare your employee experience metrics to similar businesses.

Highlights.name: Dedicated People Science Team
Highlights.description: Data-driven insights you can trust. Our team of experts ensures every analysis is grounded in research.

Highlights.name: Caring Customer Success Champions
Highlights.description: Your success is our mission. We're here to help you get the most out of Engage Rocket every step of the way.

enhanced_description: Engage Rocket is a leading global employee experience platform designed to foster a culture of success through continuous listening and real-time analytics. Trusted by companies across 18 countries and 20 industries, it empowers organizations of all sizes, from small to large and global enterprises. The platform provides team sentiment visibility, enables data-driven decisions, and facilitates intelligent action planning. Key benefits include enhancing employee engagement, accelerating skill development, boosting satisfaction and retention, and ultimately increasing productivity to drive success for both people and businesses. It offers unique features like benchmarking with industry data and is supported by a dedicated People Science Team and caring Customer Success Champions.
key_use_cases: Facilitating intelligent action planning for engagement initiatives
Benchmarking employee experience metrics against industry data
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
competitive_advantages: Global reach and trust (18 countries, 20 industries)
Ability to benchmark with industry data
Dedicated People Science Team for expert insights
Caring Customer Success Champions for support
roi_benefits: Creation of a thriving workplace where individuals perform at their best
